measure.title: Protective measure allowing carrier to condition traveling to Czech Republic by fulfilling Arrival form
measure.meta_description: Dopravce nesmí umožnit cestu cestujícím, na které dopadá povinnost vyplnit elektronický Příjezdový formulář

content.processed:
International bus carriers and air transporters are to prevent those who travel from third countries or their parts that are not on the list of countries or their parts with a low risk of contagion of COVID-19 under clause III.1 and who are required to fill in the electronic form as referred to in clause I.2, from using their services, if they do not submit the certificate received on filling in the electronic form.

Full text of the measure.

measure.norm: The carrier must not allow passengers who are obliged to fill in the electronic Arrival Form.
